ChapterShortDescription: Developer student club, Thapar is an initiative to concentrate the efforts of many student developers in and around Punjab to learn, share and get productive using the various Google products.
ChapterLongDec: Developer Student Clubs are university based community groups for students interested in Google developer technologies. Students from all undergraduate or graduate programs with an interest in growing as a developer are welcome. By joining a DSC, students grow their knowledge in a peer-to-peer learning environment and build solutions for local businesses and their community.
aboutGDGProgram: Developer Student Clubs are university based community groups for students interested in Google developer technologies.
